definition: stick/pole/lever/classifier for long objects such as guns

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: He understands that the days are gone when the party can maintain political stability with the muzzle of a gun.
sentences.chinese: 他知道一个政党靠枪杆子出政权的日子一去不复返了。

sentences.english: The pen is mightier than the sword.
Words may well be a powerful weapon, as powerful as a gun.
sentences.chinese: 文字可以是强大的武器，和枪杆子一样硬。

sentences.english: He set a post in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 他在地上树起了一根杆子。

sentences.english: The jowar stalks collapsed into the mud and the grain turned black.
sentences.chinese: 高粱杆子倒在泥地里，穗粒儿变黑了。

sentences.english: So it's like a skateboard with a stick?
sentences.chinese: 看起来像是加了根杆子的滑板？

sentences.english: By rule of gun wonders can be achieved anywhere even in India.
sentences.chinese: 枪杆子里出政权，哪里都一样，包括印度。

sentences.english: Land disputes became overheated and were frequently resolved at the point of a gun.
sentences.chinese: 土地争端变得火爆异常，而且基本上是枪杆子说了算。

sentences.english: Wrap it halfway around the pole or timber.
sentences.chinese: 将它在杆子或木头上环绕半圈。

sentences.english: Selected Works of Mao Tse-tung is the classic translation penned by those translators but who were being guarded by gun.
sentences.chinese: 是手里拿着笔杆子背后站着枪杆子逼出来的经典翻译。

sentences.english: Selected Works of Mao Tse-tung is the classic translation penned by those translators but who were being guarded by gun.
sentences.chinese: 是手里拿着笔杆子背后站着枪杆子逼出来的经典翻译。

sentences.english: He kept probing the crusty snow with a pole.
sentences.chinese: 他老是用一根杆子探测硬雪。

sentences.english: Shep found the staff glowing brighter and brighter.
sentences.chinese: 三浦发现手中的杆子在发光，光芒越来越强烈。

sentences.english: "Pole men" would collect it in vats, carried on a pole.
sentences.chinese: “竿子工”会将其收集进缸子里，而用杆子挑着缸子。

sentences.english: Bullets change governments far surer than votes.
sentences.chinese: 改朝换代枪杆子可比选票可靠得多。

definition: wooden club (used to beat clothes in washing)
stick/pole/lever/classifier for long objects such as guns
